mapper.select: SELECT CART.CART_CODE, CART.MEMBER_ID, CART.ITEM_CODE, DETAIL_ITEM.ITEM_TITLE, ITEM.ITEM_PRICE, CART.ITEM_COUNT, DETAIL_ITEM.ITEM_IMAGE1 as ITEM_IMAGE FROM CART, ITEM, DETAIL_ITEM WHERE CART.ITEM_CODE = ITEM.ITEM_CODE AND CART.ITEM_CODE = DETAIL_ITEM.ITEM_CODE AND MEMBER_ID = #{id} ORDER BY CART_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART (CART_CODE, MEMBER_ID, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_COUNT) VALUES (cart_seq.nextval, #{memberId}, #{itemCode}, #{itemCount})
